alert.note: Alert for Custer; Lincoln; Logan; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 7:08PM CDT until July 22 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lincoln County in southwestern Nebraska... Southern Logan County in west central Nebraska... Southeastern McPherson County in west central Nebraska... Southwestern Custer County in central Nebraska... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 708 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Stapleton to 8 miles west of Gandy to Ringgold, moving south at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... North Platte, Stapleton, Brady, Maxwell, Gandy, North Platte Airport, Ringgold, Keith, Tarboz Lake, Shanklin Bluff, Etna and Hoagland. This includes the following highways... Highway 92 between mile markers 213 and 243. Highway 97 near mile marker 1. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 178 and 202. Highway 83 between mile markers 85 and 121. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
